entry.title: Good Luck, Babe.
entry.summary:
Author: teklarn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 60,398Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 488

Summary: Born as the heir to a dirty fortune and nothing more, since you could walk you’ve known you’d marry someone for the sake of carrying on your family’s legacy. Trying to find love was never forbidden―it was simply out of the question. There was no point in finding it when you were betrothed to a complete stranger. As the prized and only daughter of Roman Sionis, otherwise known as the infamous crime lord Black Mask, what choice was there to make?Mafia boss Bruce Wayne strikes a deal with your father―join your two incredibly powerful and wealthy families by marrying off the soul heirs. That would be you, and Bruce Wayne’s adopted ‘golden son,’ Richard Grayson.The first time you meet Dick, he’s nothing short of a typical rich kid. Polite in all the ways that mattered, a little arrogant and a little flashy for your taste, but cute nonetheless. But when you meet Dick’s bodyguard, Jason Todd―a reformed criminal paying off his debt to the Wayne’s―everything changes. Jason is handsome, aloof, dangerous, everything you aren’t allowed to have.And now, he’s suddenly everything you want.

entry.title: Adjustments
entry.summary:
Author: gingerandcinnamon07

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,971Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 59

Summary: After a mission helping Constantine goes awry, you and Jason now have to navigate him being bitten by a werewolf (yes) and all the small, or large, adjustments that come with that. While Constantine works to find a reversal — after all, he got you all into this mess and portal-hopping-lycanthropes weren’t in the mission briefing — the two of you try to just take it all business as usual. Course that’s pretty difficult when there’s a whole family of bats getting in the way, Jason starts getting growly, and you’re fairly certain that this is all some weird fever dream. What could go wrong?

entry.title: It shouldn't bother you...
entry.summary:
Author: Honey_bellie

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,067Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 6

Summary: You have just moved into Gotham a few months ago, you have a new house, a teaching job at a new school, a new sense of normality. Still you couldn't help but feel something is wrong with this city, with you and it wasn't just the fact you were in the number one "avoid at all costs living here" city. You felt empty, alone, until a interesting someone entered your life, but still he seemed to have some secrets, some repressed feelings, traumas that might just ruin the only thing good in your new life or maybe... it just might make your relationship stronger?

entry.title: i'd tell you i love you, but then i'd have to kill you
entry.summary:
Author: in_violet_hues

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,694Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 27

Summary: There's a war against Gotham. Guess which side of it you're on? The Arkham Knight's. Under covert circumstances involving Deathstroke, you've been assigned a "special" role, where you operate outside the militia's hierarchy. And it's all thanks to the "unique skills" you possess. That means you have no rank, no restrictions, and an unspoken agreement that would probably turn the entire militia against you. There are just a few problems:- You answer only to the Knight.- You don't like each other (makes the first point difficult).- Also, he's the same guy you hooked up with on your first night in Gotham (makes everything difficult). You're off to a great start. OR: You unknowingly had a one-night stand with your new commander. You try really, really hard not to let it happen again. [No use of Y/N but a codename/nickname will be used]

entry.title: The Bloom Knot
entry.summary:
Author: nocteris

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,244Chapters: 7/22Kudos: 70

Summary: “I suggest we ignore that it happened.” Your jaw physically dropped, “what?” “You got any soul marks on you?” You had already checked a million times, but you still removed your gloves to show him. Both ring fingers clean, you flexed them in his direction. “Same here,” he waved his already bare hands, clean as day. “So, we forget it ever happened unless some strange shit happens.” ——— Where you and Jason accidentally trigger the curse of soulmates— a curse that binds you to the first person you touch hands with. The plan was simple, to avoid each other. There was no way you—a STEM major, would cross paths with him anyway. So, what the hell were you doing in his Comparative Literature 121 lecture hall?

entry.title: East of Eden
entry.summary:
Author: girl_unknown

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,733Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 10

Summary: Firelight. The scrape of his chair leg on the tile. The sound of rain against the windows. The smell of coffee lingering, welcoming in the air. You, leaning over the counter with that effortless, infinite warmth, like it cost you nothing to give it away so freely.He hated you for that. Hated that you made him feel things he didn’t want to feel. Curiosity, attraction, hope. Dangerous, dangerous hope.Damn it… who the hell are you?...As the threat of war between Gotham’s crime families rises, Jason must investigate a coffee shop with ties to Carmine Falcone and finds it increasingly difficult to remain detached from the one person he never wanted to get close to.
